search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for REsimpli 3.0 (resimpli-1.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for REsimpli is: [https://resimpli.com/pricing/](https://resimpli.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: REsimpli CRM Pricing - Get started with a 30-day free trial

extracted_content.content:
Save up to 29% Yearly Monthly

Free Courses 30 Day Free Trial Unlimited Onboardings

   
| 
#### Included In All Plans

*   Free Skip Tracing
*   Free Cash Buyer Searches
*   Drip Campaign![Image 1: info](https://cdn-cnkod.nitrocdn.com/ruoSwcGkrfAFJBwhAOTHwBdIwFhKZZHX/assets/images/optimized/rev-8d16524/resimpli.com/wp-content/themes/REsimpli/images/white-info-icon.svg) Drip Campaign consists of a series of customized, scheduled, and automated contact activities, or drips, that investors use to optimize lead follow-up. Each activity is scheduled and executed without additional work from the real estate investor.  
    Choose from Tasks, SMS, Emails, RVM, and Direct Mail.
    
*   Direct Mail![Image 2: info](https://cdn-cnkod.nitrocdn.com/ruoSwcGkrfAFJBwhAOTHwBdIwFhKZZHX/assets/images/optimized/rev-8d16524/resimpli.com/wp-content/themes/REsimpli/images/white-info-icon.svg) Send postcards and letters from within REsimpli, at as low as 50c.
    
*   Call, Text and Email
*   List Stacking![Image 3: info](https://cdn-cnkod.nitrocdn.com/ruoSwcGkrfAFJBwhAOTHwBdIwFhKZZHX/assets/images/optimized/rev-8d16524/resimpli.com/wp-content/themes/REsimpli/images/white-info-icon.svg) List Stacking combines and manages different lists (i.e. Absentee, Driving for Dollars, Probate, etc.) of motivated sellers for more targeted marketing.
    
*   Gmail Integration![Image 4: info](https://cdn-cnkod.nitrocdn.com/ruoSwcGkrfAFJBwhAOTHwBdIwFhKZZHX/assets/images/optimized/rev-8d16524/resimpli.com/wp-content/themes/REsimpli/images/white-info-icon.svg) Link your email inbox and manage your incoming emails within REsimpli. Attach email conversations with sellers, buyers, and vendors to specific leads or properties.
    
*   KPI Dashboard![Image 5: info](https://cdn-cnkod.nitrocdn.com/ruoSwcGkrfAFJBwhAOTHwBdIwFhKZZHX/assets/images/optimized/rev-8d16524/resimpli.com/wp-content/themes/REsimpli/images/white-info-icon.svg)Get detailed insights to all your KPIs in your REsimpli real estate CRM
    
*   SEO Optimised Website
*   Driving For Dollars![Image 6: info](https://cdn-cnkod.nitrocdn.com/ruoSwcGkrfAFJBwhAOTHwBdIwFhKZZHX/assets/images/optimized/rev-8d16524/resimpli.com/wp-content/themes/REsimpli/images/white-info-icon.svg) The Driving for Dollars feature helps you drive around a neighborhood to look for distressed, potentially vacant, or other investment properties that you can wholesale for a profit. It also includes a route tracking feature for real estate wholesalers to document and contact unlisted or off-market houses.
    
*   E-signature
